ygData.subject: Re: Stilleto of the Bloodclaw
ygData.msgSnippet: And, I believe, it is useable only by Shadowknights, Necromancers, and Rogues.... I think. (smile) Tim Tallonn Stringfellow - Bertox ... From: Garramone,
ygData.messageBody:
And, I believe, it is useable only by Shadowknights, Necromancers, and
Rogues....


I think. (smile)

Tim
Tallonn Stringfellow - Bertox

-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) <Michael.Garramone@...>
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com' <eqbards@onelist.com>

Subject: Re: [eqbards] Stilleto of the Bloodclaw


>From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
>i believe it is a life tap, takes health from what you are attacking and
>gives it to you. not sure how many hp it takes.
>
>Shada Silverleaf, Level 45 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
>
